definition: glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)

pinyin: rong2 mao2 xing4 xian4 ji1 su4

sentences.english: Objective To set up a successful animal model of steroid-induced osteonecrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的成功制作激素性骨坏死的动物模型。

sentences.english: In men, low testosterone levels can cause a loss of bone mass.
sentences.chinese: 对于男性来说，睾丸激素低水平会导致骨量的流失。

sentences.english: All kinds of medicine to eat, especially those containing hormone medicine.
sentences.chinese: 各种药都要少吃，特别是一些含有激素的药。

sentences.english: Use of inhaled corticosteroids does not clearly reduce these risks.
sentences.chinese: 使用吸入激素不能确切的降低这一危险性。

sentences.english: Glucocorticoid plus CTX may be used to treat lupus-like hepatitis with caution.
sentences.chinese: 糖皮质激素联合CTX治疗狼疮样肝炎可以慎用。

sentences.english: Beral thinks a more interesting candidate for study is prolactin .
sentences.chinese: 贝拉尔认为，一个更为有趣的研究课题是泌乳刺激素。

sentences.english: How do you respond to questions about performance-enhancing-drug use?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎样回答关于运动激素药物服用的问题的？

sentences.english: Hormones have long been associated with some forms of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 激素类的药物一直被用作治疗某些癌症。

sentences.english: But fertile floret number is directly regulated by hormones after the top spikelet formation.
sentences.chinese: 而顶小穗形成之后，激素直接调节小花的发育。

sentences.english: The effect of estrogens on fibrocystic breast disease (FBD) are controversial.
sentences.chinese: 雌激素对乳腺纤维囊性增生病的影响各家报道不一。

sentences.english: Pregnancy and estrogen-based medications can cause cavernous hemangiomas to grow.
sentences.chinese: 妊娠和雌激素药物可能导致的海绵状血管瘤增长。

sentences.english: These effects of excess androgens are called virilization and occur rarely.
sentences.chinese: 这些过多雄激素的影响即罕见的女性男性化。

sentences.english: Just over 1500 of the women in the study were hormone users.
sentences.chinese: 研究对象中有1500余人接受过激素治疗。

sentences.english: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) is defined as a syndrome of ovarian hyperandrogenism and chronic anovulation.
sentences.chinese: 多囊卵巢综合征以雄激素过多和持续无排卵为特征。

sentences.english: Adrenal cortical hormone is effective in the treatment of HNL.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺皮质激素在治疗HNL方面疗效满意。

sentences.english: The significance of pathogenesis of Growth-hormone secreting pituitary adenomas.
sentences.chinese: 深入探讨垂体生长激素腺瘤发病机制的重要性。

definition: glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
